location: A FARMHOUSE OUTSIDE NEW YORK CITY

text: On the farmhouse roof a CHICKEN-SHAPED WEATHERVANE stands against a FULL, BLOOD-RED MOON.  The wind HOWLS and the v an EERIE SQUEAK.  Then a weird ANIMAL CRY is heard--a cro chicken CROWING and a wolf HOWLING.
A fenced-in dirt area with numerous CHICKENS milling arou they peck at the ground.
(ANOTHER HOWL, nearer now)
The chickens' heads jerk up toward the sound.
A RED-tinted, shaky, MOVING CAMERA TRUCK-IN on the chicke are in the style of the POV SHOTS in WOLFEN.)  Magnified HEAVY BREATHING of Werechicken is heard.
The terrified chickens stare INTO CAMERA as the Werechick his shadow falling over them.  They flap into their coop, wildly.
MAUDE and ZEKE sit on the sagging couch watching a werewo while munching popcorn from a huge bowl.  They're distrac SQUAWKING.
Sump'n's stirrin' up the chickens, Maude.
Jes' set easy, Zeke. (she rises; heads for door)
I'll take a look-see. Zeke continues staring at TV.
Through the Werechicken's red eyes, we see a distant imag flashlight, approaching the fenced-in chicken pen and ope CAMERA STARTS MOVING IN toward Maude as she enters, leavi
The dirt compound is empty now as Maude crosses toward wo coop.
(as she goes)
Here, chick-chick-chick-chick.
AS Maude ENTERS from OUT OF CAMERA, her flashlight beam i chickens cowering on their roosts in a corner.  They CLUC
What's got you girls so durned upset? There a coyote sneakin' 'round? Suddenly the Werechicken's shadow moves up Maude's back,
(Low, gutteral CLU-UCK)
Maude looks over her shoulder AT CAMERA, reacts.
(GASP!)
Red-eyed, grotesque, three times the size of an ordinary stands framed in the moonlit doorway.  It opens its fange horrifying SHRIEK as it springs AT CAMERA, wings flapping
(Frightening SHRIEK)
Old black-and-white movie.  MELODRAMATIC MUSIC as a man t werewolf, his HOWL a continuation of the previous Werechi
(eerie HOWL)
continues watching TV and eating popcorn.  Maude walks st behind him, eyes staring blankly.
(without looking up)
Everythin' okay out there, Maude?
She stares with glassy, red eyes and CLUCKS quietly.
(CLUCKS)

What say? PAN DOWN below Maude's waist to reveal that she's turning from the feet up.  First her shoes RIP apart as large, ye sprout.  Then her dress SWELLS and SPLITS, revealing a la body underneath. The only piece of clothing left on her i foot scratches the floor.
(more CLUCKS)

Now completely transformed and six feet tall, she leaps u back of couch, THRUSTING her chicken head repeatedly into in Zeke's lap, pecking the bowl clean.  Zeke's jaw hangs as he stares at the fanged, drooling, six-foot Werechicke Werechicken looks up from the empty bowl, right in Zeke's
(SCREAMS)
He scrambles backwards off the couch.
SCENE RED-tinted.   We hear loud SQUAWKING from within ho feathers fly out the open windows.
(YELLING)
Get away!' Scat!  Shoo!
(loud SQUAWKING)
Watching from slight hilltop.  Its beak seems to bend int grin.
(from distance)
Help!... He-elp!
As CAMERA MOVES IN, we hear:
Egon, could you hold off on the weather balloon bit for a minute?

They stand holding big plastic bags of trash, obviously a O.S. Egon.  Ray's armful of trash is piled so high that h it.  SLIMER hovers behind, sticking his nose in one of th dog.  He finally dives right into it.
It's Your night to take out the trash.
And Winston's in the kitchen doing your dishes.
He's busy testing his WEATHER BALLOON--a large, pink bubb of the room.  He moves a lever on its remote control unit rises.
(preoccupied; through above)
Be with you in ... (checks watch)
...one minute, fifty-three seconds.

Peter and Ray exchange pained glances.  Peter awkwardly a up another trash bag while Ray stumbles around, his visio WITH THEM as they move toward door when Egon's weather ba lowers INTO FRAME.  They bounce into and off of it, which bags flying.
(AD-LIB REACTIONS as they bounce off balloon)
Peter stumbles backwards and lands butt-first right on on Slimer SQUEALS from within it.
(big muffled SQUEAL)
Then he comes shooting out the back of the bag, the lower flat as a Frisbee.
shakes himself off like a dog, spraying slime all over Pe
(pissed; sarcastic)
Thanks, Slimer.  I really needed that!
Sorreee!
Ray helps Peter up as the telephone RINGS and RINGS.
(irritated)
Egon!  The phone!
The RINGING phone is right beside him on the workbench.
(preoccupied with remote controls)
In a minute, Ray.
He ENTERS with sleeves rolled up, wiping a plate with a d wearing an apron.
(sarcastic)
Nevermind, Egon, wouldn't want you to strain yourself. (picks up phone)
Ghostbusters Central.
(excited CHATTER)
Calm down... Where are you?... (a BEAT as he listens)
We'll be right there. He hangs up.
Peter and Ray again have their arms full of trash bags. dragging one.
Ready for this one?  Some farmer says his wife was eaten by a giant chicken.
Hey, even a half-baked false alarm sounds better than doing Egon's chores. (he drops trash bags)
Let's roll! Ray and Slimer also abandon their trash bags and EXIT wit Winston.
still oblivious as he works in the suddenly empty room.
I think I've finally perfected it.  Watch this, guys. (a BEAT, he looks around over shoulder)
Guys?
ECTO-1 roars INTO CAMERA, siren and lights going.
The Ghostbusters, minus Egon, are wearing their gear.  Sl back seat.
It sure feels strange not having Egon with us.
(sarcastic)
Why?  Lately even when he's with us, he's not with us.
Driving.
But wouldn't it be somethin' if he sells that weather balloon idea of his?  He'll be a rich man!
Arms folded, grumpily.
Good.  Then he can hire a maid to do his share of the chores.
As it speeds OUT OF CAMERA toward distant farmhouse, PAN apron-wearing Maude-Chicken silhouetted in the moonlight, haystack.  MOVE IN TO --
Her body starts to shake, she ruffles her wings.
(Egg-laying CLUCKS)
Then she suddenly sits up and leaps off the haystack, rev enormous egg beneath her.  Maude SQUAWKS and CLUCKS and s cornfield, pecking away at ears of corn.
(SQUAWKS and CLUCKS)
Ray, Winston and Slimer listen seriously as Zeke speaks, obviously not buying it.
Had big blood-red eyes, it did.  Biggest dang chicken I ever seen.  Mebbe six feet tall. Peter rolls his eyes.
Shouldn't be hard to find.
is jotting info on notepad.
Did it have any distinguishing marks?
Ray!  It's six feet tall! Peter grabs Ray's arm, starts ushering him to front door.
(over shoulder as he goes)
Thank you, Sir.  We'll put out a missing chicken report right away.
As the three Ghostbusters and Slimer cross toward Ecto-1
(as they go)
This one's easy, guys.  Old Zeke's been watchin' too many horror movies and eating too much greasy popcorn.
No, Peter, I think we're dealing with a bonafide werechicken here.
Peter and Winston stop, look at Ray in disbelief.
A werechicken?
Get serious, Ray.
Then explain those! Ray points at ground.  Peter, Winston and Slimer look dow
Peter is standing with both feet in two enormous chicken
The three Ghostbusters follow Maude's "chicken" tracks wi flashlights across a field spotted with haystacks.  Slime nose to ground like a bloodhound.
(SNIFFS as he goes)
He floats along above the flashlight-illuminated tracks w right into the haystack.  We hear a BONK from within, the
Ow! Slimer backs OUT INTO SHOT rubbing his head.  He looks up wide.
(amazed GASP!)
The Ghostbusters ENTER SHOT and play their flashlights ac sitting atop the haystack.
(excited)
What'd I tell you, Peter?  A werechicken egg!  Gimme a hand, Winston!
As Ray and Winston ease the egg down off the haystack.  P PKE meter up to it.
Look, if this is a werechicken egg,
Nothing registers on the meter.
...how come there's no PKE reading?
Ray and Winston still hold giant egg.
(looking at meter in Peter's hand)
I dunno... that is strange.
Let's get it back to Headquarters and run some tests.  Then maybe we'll have some answers.
Oh no, I'm not leavin'.  The werechicken that laid this has gotta be around here someplace -- and I'm gonna find it.
(throws up his hands with heavy SIGH)
I'll take it.  C'mon, Slimer. They take egg from Ray and Winston and start back toward
(shaking his head; as he goes)
Werechickens.
Through its RED EYES we see, from a distance, Peter and S the egg, Ray and Winston moving off in other direction.
(BREATHING & SLOBBERING)
Egon still busy with his balloon as Peter and Slimer carr door.
(through above)
Yo, balloon man, we've got some real work for you:  How about analyzing this?
Egon looks around, reacts to egg.
Interesting.  That's the second biggest egg I've ever seen. Peter and Slimer set egg on Egon's desk.

I don't wanna hear about it, Egon.  We've had a long night in a not-too-fragrant barnyard, so I'm taking a shower and hitting the sheets. Peter EXITS as Slimer ZIPS in close beside Egon, elbows o hands, eyeing Egon and egg expectantly.  Egon pushes glas nose and blinks at egg, not sure what to do with it.  CAM egg and we --
CAMERA PANS DOWN from full moon to reveal the tiny figure Winston approaching an old barn.  They stop, shining thei closed main door.
(tired)
Ray, it's gettin' pretty late.  Maybe there really isn't any...
(holds up one hand)
Shh!
Ray extends his PKE meter toward barn.  It BEEPS incessan
(low voice)
It's in there.
(unclipping his blaster)
Then let's get it!
Through its RED EYES we see the barn door slowly CREAK op and Winston peering in.

They ENTER cautiously, Ray holding his BEEPING meter out barn is dark except for the moonlight slanting through th the beams of their flashlights.  As the WIND picks up, WO RUSTLES, and a piece of JUNKY machinery turns with a SQUE
(WHISPER)
Man, this place is creepy.
(WHISPER)
It's in here -- I can feel it.
Suddenly the door SLAMS shut behind them and the FLAP OF SCURRIES through the darkness.  Winston JUMPS.
Look out! Ray shines his flashlight toward the lofts.  Its beam cat startled pigeons as they fly out the window, pinion feath
(relieved SIGHS)
RED-TINTED, moving slowly toward Ray and Winston from beh
(HEAVY BREATHING)
They stop as PKE meter starts BEEPING.  Ray checks the re
(whisper)
Something's close.  Very close.
Closing on Ray and Winston.
(HEAVY BREATHING)
The guys wheel around.
We see only its face.  The blood-red eyes stare menacingl beak slightly open and drooling.
(HEAVY RASPY BREATHING)
It hops forward into a streak of moonlight.  It's three f wings hang out at the sides, and its evil, blood-red eyes
(HEAVY PANTING)
It is a werechicken! ANGLE ON RAY and WINSTON Backing away, blasters leveled.
Man, he is ugly!
It postures, rooster-like and:
(ROARS angrily)
ON RAY and WINSTON Still backing up.
Bad choice of words, Winston. THE WERECHICKEN suddenly leaps AT CAMERA.
(loud SHRIEKING SQUAWK)
ZOOM-IN on Winston and Ray.  They open fire.
The proton streams catch the Werechicken in mid-air as it Ray and Winston, halting its leap and suspending it in a energy.
(SHRIEKS)
A HIDEOUS SPIRIT rises from its writhing body -- shapeles monstrous glowing eyes and fangs.  The spirit lets out a frightening than the Werechicken howl.
(big ROAR)
Ray, still firing his gun, snaps a trap loose from his be onto the barn floor.  It POPS open.
Trap out!
Ray and Winston, struggling with the writhing Spirit caug streams, guide the Spirit into the trap.
Hang on!  That's it!
We've almost got him!
The Spirit is sucked into the trap, which SLAMS shut.
A normal chicken with singed feathers stands where the We It CLUCKS, starts pecking at the dirt.
(Normal CLUCKING)
(looking at chicken)
Well, that takes care of one werechicken.
Ray picks up the smoking trap.
Now to find the six-footer that ate Zeke's wife. They head for the door.  Winston stops.
Ray, I just had a thought... Ray pauses to look around at Winston.
What if that six-foot werechicken is Zeke's wife? And off their looks, we --
Egon carries the big egg into kitchen, Slimer helping.
(straining)
Thanks for the help, Slimer, but I don't have time to examine this egg tonight.  I have to prepare for my weather balloon demonstration tomorrow morning.
With his elbow, Egon opens refrigerator with and the two giant egg inside.
(through above)
But it'll be safe in here.
Yeah. Egon closes fridge.
(big YAWN)
G'night, Egon. Slimer floats off.
Goodnight, Slimer.
Slimer is SNORING, hovering above Peter's empty bed.
(SNORING)

In a BUBBLE above him, we see Slimer's DREAM, various kin dancing and SINGING the first two bars of Los Lobos' "LA California Raisins in "I Heard It Through The Grapevine." Slimer licks his lips hungrily, opens his mouth incredibl pounces on the entire dream balloon with a teeth-jarring the dream bubble so that it EXPLODES inside his mouth, wa Slimer sits up with a wide-eyed, hungry look, rubbing his
Fooooood. He zips o.s.
Dark.  Lights go on, then Slimer SKIDS to mid-air stop an fridge.  His eyes pop as he sees the egg.
(licking his lips)

Yummy! Slimer rolls egg toward edge of shelf, then the full weig drives Slimer straight to the floor.  The egg bounces on before he gets a grip on it.  Straining his little green floats the egg up into the air and o.s.
(SQUEALS, then GRUNTS)
Slimer shoves egg in the open oven, closes door, turns on moves O.S.  The oven interior glows red and the egg start
Slimer HUMS as he busily sets table for one:  placemat, a salt, pepper, ketchup, mustard, mayo, relish, ... a flurr that all focuses on his personal eating spot.
(HUMMING through above)
Through window we see the egg shake and then begin to cra
Hovering at table, still preparing for feast.  He puts on of oven shaking behind him.
(still HUMMING)
With a loud BANG, the oven practically explodes and the d Out pops a BABY WERECHICKEN, SNARLING and CACKLING.
(SNARLING, CACKLING)
His eyes bug and his paw drops.
(startled SCREAM)
Slimer barrels up through sink faucet, leaving his bib st opening.
Peter shampooing his hair.
(AD LIB SINGING)
Slimer comes shooting out through shower nozzle, hugs Pet the neck and scaring the hell out of him.
(startled YELL; then:)
Slimer!  How 'bout some privacy??
(pointing, eyes wide)
Monster!  Inna kitchen!
Monster?
(nods)
Uh-huh!  Uh-huh! (imitates werechicken) (SNARLING & CACKLING)
Egon works at his table.  A now familiar Werechicken shad his shoulder and grows up the wall.
Werechicken creeps OUT OF CAMERA, bites Egon on the rear o.s., chicken claws CLATTERING off into distance.
(looking around)
Ow!
(CACKLING fading into distance)
Dazed, he looks down at his feet.
Chicken toes pop through the leather, one at a time.
(dazed)
What?
As Egon's transformation continues:  His coveralls RIP ap then midriff, then his arms turn into wings.  Finally, a his face.
(Weird CLUCK)
Peter (now dressed and wearing his backpack) runs up to l flings it open, Slimer right behind him.
Peter and Slimer look in, not seeing Egon, who is now a s werechicken, but still wearing his glasses, standing behi
(CALLS)
Egon? (to Slimer)
Well, Slimer, I don't see anything here that looks like a monster. The Egon-Chicken jumps out right in front of Peter and Sl
(CHICKEN HOWL)
Slimer freaks and rockets right through the nearest wall.
(SQUEALS as he goes)
Holy cow!! Peter raises his proton gun.
He flaps his wings wildly, his red eyes bulging, and GROW impressive fangs.
(LOUD GROWL)
Egon the Werechicken moves toward Peter, fangs bared in a
(SNARLING as he goes)
He steps back into doorway, blaster leveled at Egon-Chick the power.  It HUMS to life.
(horrified)
What'd you do to Egon, you bird-brain!
Peter!  Wait! A hand grabs Peter by the arm fust as the thrower fires, proton stream off at an angle into ceiling, barely missin
(surprised as he looks around)
Hey!
as Ray pulls Peter out into corridor, Winston kicks door Egon-Chicken's snarling face and quickly locks it.  Slime looking worried.
(SNARLS)
The door SHAKES and SHUDDERS as the unseen Egon-Chicken t through.
(irritated; through above)
What's wrong with you guys?  That thing ate Egon!
Peter, that is Egon!  The egg hatched, he was bitten and now he's a werechicken! The door behind them is starting to splinter and bulge fr of the Egon-Chicken.
(looking at door)
You're kidding! (a BEAT, then)
Come to think of it, there was a certain resemblance. Suddenly the battering stops.
(looking toward door)
What happened?  He's so quiet all of a sudden.
Looking toward o.s. window, he reacts.
It's the moon! He hurries o.s.
Ray stops at window, looks out.  Beyond we see the full m Winston and Slimer come up behind him.
Tonight's the first --
It's beginning to disappear, right to left.
-- lunar eclipse in ten years!
All looking out window as eclipse continues
Ray, what's this have to do with Egon being a chicken?
(turning to others)
Werechickens only appear during a full moon, and for the next few minutes, the moon's not full.
Door opens and Ray pecks in.
(tentative)
Egon?
Seen from the waist up (he's not wearing clothes), lookin confused.  He sees Ray.
Ray, what is going on?
Egon is holding his tattered coveralls in front of his wa skirt.
And why am I naked? Suddenly Slimer flies INTO SHOT and gives Egon a big, slo
(as he enters)
Egon! (KISSING SOUNDS)
Sit down, Egon, we have some good news and some bad news.
(as he sits)
Bad news first.
You've been turned into a werechicken!
His glasses slip to the end of his nose as his eyes widen back up.
A werechicken?
He hurriedly thumbs through the TOBIN SPIRIT GUIDE.
(flipping through book)
Were-aardvarks ... were-bears werechickens! (reads)
"The werechicken appears during the full moon.  Anyone it bites will turn into another werechicken." (he looks at Egon)
That egg Peter brought in, it hatched and...
He rubs his rear.
(through above)
I remember the bite clearly.  How long will I stay like this? ON RAY, WINSTON and PETER Looking at the Tobin Guide.
(looking in Tobin's Guide)
According to this, there is an antidote. But we've gotta move fast -- the eclipse only lasts three minutes!
Slimer scrambles through the cupboard, grabbing various b and hands them to Winston who adds ingredients to mixing while Ray reads from Tobin's Guide.
(reading through above)
"One tablespoon paprika, one clove of garlic, some parsley for color, cup of gelatin..."
Through it we see the eclipsed moon starting to emerge fr
His pupils look constricted and he's perspiring.
(weakly)
I don't feel well. Peter steps INTO SHOT, puts arm around Egon's shoulders.
(through above)
Take it easy, Egon.  You're gonna be fine. (SHOUTS O.S.; worried)
Hurry it up, guys!
(reading hurriedly)
"And one tablespoon of chickenbane."
He rummages through shelves, then looks down at Ray.
(aghast)
No chickenbane!
Ray and winston exchange panicky looks.
Then we've gotta go with this!  C'mon! They run OUT with the mixing bowl of liquid.  Slimer foll
They're once again turning into chicken legs and chicken popping out like popcorn.
(YELLS)
Come on, Ray!!
As Peter and Egon stare down at the chicken legs and chic
(YELLS o.s.)
He's changing again! Ray, Slimer and Winston rush INTO SHOT.
(breathless)
Quick, Egon, drink this! Winston hands the bowl of potion to Egon, who gulps it do
(swallowing, GULPING sounds)
As Egon drinks, his arms transform into wings and he drop breaking it.
We're too late!
As the transformation  and feathers  rise up  his shoulde the transformation  stops at  the neck.   DRAMATIC MUSIC

head_text.subj: ON PETER, RAY, WINSTON AND SLIMER

text: They stare, wide-eyed.  After A BEAT --
What happened?
To include Egon, who is once again a six-foot-tall chicke Egon's own neck and head.
The potion only partly worked, because of the missing chickenbane.
Well, we hafta do something!
Don't get your feathers ruffled, Peter. There's a logical solution to every problem.
(HOWL)
Strands of slime stand straight up on the nape of Slimer' sound -- like a frightened cat -- and he dives into a tes on Egon's workbench.
(SQUEALS as he goes)
looking around.
What was that?
The werechicken that bit Egon.  It's still out there somewhere.
(to others)
Let's stop that thing before it makes drumsticks out of anyone else! (to Egon)
Un, no offense, Egon. The three normal Ghostbusters dash toward door.
ECTO-2 glides over the city, running lights blinking.
Peter at the controls.  Slimer sits beside him, looking d through binoculars.
(into radio mike)
All quiet on the chicken front.  How about down there?
Winston driving.  Ray on the radio.
Not a peep.
(gives Ray a dirty look)
No pun intended.
Several people run out front door SCREAMING as ECTO-1 pas
(SCREAMING as they exit)
Winston and Ray look back at exiting people.
That's it! Winston cranks the wheel.
As it makes a SCREECHING U-turn.
Ecto-1 SKIDS up, doors open, and Ray and Winston leap out ready, running toward store entrance.
Ray and winston run in and stop inside door beside a pani points o.s.
(breathless)
It's in there!  A big chicken!  It's gotta be ten feet tall!
Ray and Winston exchange glances.
Ten feet tall?
(nods)
Maybe fifteen, I dunno.  Big! (he runs o.s.)
I'm outta here!
(to Winston)
Let's split up. They run off in opposite directions, flanking the long ai
PAN WITH him as he cautiously moves along, aisle by aisle aisles, Winston can be seen doing the same.  The market i spilled groceries everywhere.
As they reach the last aisle.  No chicken.  Ray joins Win
How could we lose a fifteen foot-tall chicken?
(frightened SCREAM)
We didn't!  Come on! They hurry o.s.
He's hiding under his butcher block, trembling.  Ray and SHOT.  The Butcher looks up, eyes wide.
A giant chicken just came through here -- it was thirty feet tall!
Thirty feet tall?
The Butcher is pointing out open door.  Beyond is a parki trail of crushed cars right down the middle.
Yeah!  Look what it did to those cars! Ray and Winston race out the door.
The little chopper, lights blinking, skims low past three buildings.
(into radio)
It's how big?  Okay, Ray, I admit you were right about these Werechickens,...
Peter and Slimer, as before.
...but I definitely don't buy them growing to the size of buildings.
(covers mouth, LAUGHTER FIZZING through his closed, flapping lips. "How absurd.") Suddenly, the head of the Werechicken rears up INTO SHOT Ray and Slimer.
(SCREAMS)
(deafening HOWL)
ECTO-2 is buffeted about by the howl as Peter jams the st
It makes a steep, banking dive and gets the hell out of t escaping the big Werechicken's beak that SNAPS shut on th behind Ecto-2's retreating tail.
Peter is shaken, but in control.  Slimer is trembling lik
(into mike)
Ray, you were right!  The chicken's here, and he's a walking high-rise!
(into radio)
On our way, Peter. Winston floors it and he and Ray accelerate forward INTO
Egon is "perched" on the window sill, looking pensively o still a chicken from the neck down.  A BEAT, then:
(big SCREAM)
(startled CLUCK)
Startled, Egon flutters up off the sill, gravity takes ov on his feathered butt.
Revealing Janine standing frozen in the doorway, eyes wid hands to her cheeks.
Egon!  What happened?
It's a long story, Janine.   Can you get my coat, please?  I'm due at the weather board in forty-five... (CLUCK)
...minutes.
She stares at Egon, totally bewildered.
But what ...? (thinks better of asking)
Nevermind.
Janine takes a long yellow raincoat off a door hook and h He's completely covered except for his head and feet.
Are you sure you wanna go to a meeting like -- this?
Trust me.  I'm of sound mind at least.
As he struts toward the door, we see his tail protruding the back of coat.  He EXITS, CLUCKING.
(CLUCKING as he goes)
Staring after him in disbelief.
It walks along stepping on cars, kicking over telephone p Godzilla.  The streets SHAKE.  Panicky pedestrians flee t giant feet.
(panicky WALLA)
Peter and Slimer are following giant chicken.
(into radio)
It's heading down 34th toward the Empire State Building.
Ecto-1 SPEEDS around a corner, SIREN blaring.
Check!  We're almost there.
Sun rises behind the werechicken as it approaches in dist HOWL, the streets SHAKE.
(HOWLS)
Approaching CAMERA fast, it SCREECHES to a halt.  Doors f Winston LEAP out, open fire, their proton streams angling
Moving toward them down the concrete canyon, flattening s power poles.  Ecto-2 can be seen flying above and behind streams are up toward it.
Take over, Slimer!
Roger! Slimer grabs the control stick in both hands as Peter lea side with his blaster and fires downward.

Caught in the three crossing streams.  It FLAILS about, k street lights and bashing in the sides of buildings, and deafening HOWL.  A MONSTROUS SPIRIT emerges from its body screen like a transparent film.
(enraged HOWLS)
Ray tosses out the trap.
Let's reel him in!
As Ray, Winston and Peter's beams draw the Spirit toward
(angry HOWLS)
Ray's boot stomps on trigger and trap springs open.  As t into contact with the trap a small STORM ERUPTS around it LIGHTNING BOLTS fly.  A HURRICANE-like WIND BLOWS.
Being buffeted by wind, struggling to hang onto their thr continue firing.  They have to SHOUT over the NOISE.
(loud)
Trap's full!  Somebody forgot to empty it!
The wind is really bouncing it around.  Slimer has his ha Peter continues shooting.
(YELLS)
Whose job was it?
turn to each other.
Light FLASHES rapidly.  Trap begins to shake and glow.
It's gonna blow!
(over walkie-talkie)
Peter, get outa here! It banks, gets the hell away.
turn off their proton guns and are KNOCKED down by the re the freed Monstrous Spirit whooshes skyward.  The STORM a disappears, as if SUCKED up.  The trap stops shaking and
As the Spirit POPS back into its body, JARRING it.  Its c contorts with new ANGER.
(HOWLS)
It turns and starts up the side of the Empire State Build
The werechicken is halfway to the top.  PULL BACK to reve Winston and Ray standing in street looking up at him.  Ec behind them.
So how're we gonna, put that big bird on ice, guys'
(SNAPS finger)
Peter, that's not a bed idea!  Chicken freezes at very low temperatures!
Yeah, but how do you freeze a 50-foot chicken in August? A BEAT, then the three guys look at each other.
Egon's weather balloon!
Not far from the Empire State Building.  Egon stands befo seated MEN and WOMEN --THE WEATHER BOARD -- in his rain c side, the weather balloon hovers above them.
Distinguished members of the Weather Board, my weather balloon has the clu-cluck-clu- capability --
